entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
